name: Shopping Paradise
description: Reggae Tour is a combination of travel products and services catering to the visiting tourist in Malaysia. We specialize in tour packages nationwide that give tourist the opportunity to experience Malaysian history, culture, nature, adventure and city center. Our tour packages provide unique value for money to our customers and our services include group and independent tour bookings from a day city tour to a fourteen days rendezvous all over Malaysia. They are designed to enhance and compliment Malaysian tourism filling in the absence of excitement in this demanding industry. Our objective is to give tourist amazing and unforgettable memories during their visit to our beautiful country.
